description:
* 2 BR- Private bathroom, NO Kitchen. 
* 20-min train rides to midtown Manhattan. 20 min to JFK and 12 min LaGuardia
* 2minute walk to Restaurants, shopping centers (Target, Macy’s, DSW, Red Lobster etc), supermarkets, subways (R, M trains) and buses (Q53 and Q58). 
* Private parking ($10 dollars per night), Free for guests staying 7 days. 
* Unit located on second floor 
* Two Queen size beds + one Sofa bed
* 42 Inch TV, full with most recent and popular movies
name: Entire place 2BR+bathroom, 20min to Manhattan
review: Michelle & Eddie were excellent hosts, very responsive and helpful, the unit was amazing and clean with a huge bathroom, would definitely book again
